title: Norway’s sovereign wealth fund votes ‘nei’ to Apple CEO’s $100 million pay package
content:
Norway’s gigantic sovereign wealth fund is not enamored with the nearly $100 million pay package Apple has proposed CEO Tim Cook to compensate his 2021 achievements, and will express that displeasure by voting against it when shareholders meet on March 4.

more…

The post Norway’s sovereign wealth fund votes ‘nei’ to Apple CEO’s $100 million pay package appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Norway's $1.3 trillion sovereign wealth fund and Apple shareholder to vote no on CEO Tim Cook's proposed $100 million pay package.
